<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_diagram_builder.DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOptionService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOptionService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOptionService = Class.create();
DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOptionService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    type: 'DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOptionService'
};



DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOptionService.getOptionsByNodeType = function(nodeType) {
    var optionsGr = DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOption.getOptionsByNodeType(nodeType);
	var options = [];
	while (optionsGr.next()) {
        options.push(DiagramBuilderContextMenuOptionService.getOptionByID(optionsGr.getValue(DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOption.MENU_OPTION)));
    }
	return options;
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-02-18 06:18:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6faab81f535620100b0cddeeff7b128f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>DiagramBuilderNodeMenuOptionService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Diagram Builder" source="sn_diagram_builder">1cf7ad026abf3abab12e761ddaa6e9df</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Diagram Builder">1cf7ad026abf3abab12e761ddaa6e9df</sys_scope>

</record_update>
